3686.TW.summary: Danen Technology Corporation engages in the manufacture and sale of solar ingots and wafers for photovoltaic applications worldwide. The company provides multi-crystalline solar wafers, ingots, and bricks; and customized OEM services. It serves solar cell manufacturers. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

4934.TW.summary: Tainergy Tech Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and markets solar cells in Taiwan. It offers solar energy application systems, including solar refrigerator, pumping, air conditioner, and deionized water systems; multi-crystalline and mono-crystalline silicon solar cells; solar modules; solar modules with build in Li-NMC batteries; solar power storage systems; domestic back-up power systems, such as power unit, energy storage system, power walker, and portable power station; and solar power bricks. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

6443.TW.summary: TSEC Corporation engages in the production and sale of solar cells and modules in Taiwan, Japan, the United States, Europe, China, and internationally. The company is involved in power plant construction and operation services. TSEC Corporation was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

6477.TW.summary: ANJI Technology Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells solar modules in Taiwan. The company offers poly and mono crystalline, double glass, and building integrated photovoltaic solar modules, as well as AC modules. Its products are used in power generation systems. The company also provides 3D printing services. ANJI Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.
